description.raw:
This merge was a little tricky because some camera intrinsics work from pull request #2058 was backported to gazebo9 in pull request #3099 with some changes. Per this [prior discussion](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3099/backport-camera-intrinsics-feature/diff#comment-103358103):

gazebo10 has protected members:

    Camera::cameraProjectiveMatrix
    Camera::cameraUsingIntrinsics

while gazebo9 has

    CameraPrivate::cameraProjectionMatrix (note change from Projective -> Projection)
    CameraPrivate::cameraUsingIntrinsics

Following the suggestion from @{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5} in that comment thread, I've done the following:

* changed the code to use the protected members
* removed the private members added in pull request #3099
* added the `Camera::BuildProjectionMatrix` function alongside `Camera::BuildProjectiveMatrix`
* changed `Camera::BuildProjectiveMatrix` to call `Camera::BuildProjectionMatrix` internally
* added a doxygen `\deprecated` tag to `Camera::BuildProjectiveMatrix`, though we won't officially deprecate it until the `default` branch

Checking CI and awaiting review of the conflict merging from @{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5}.
description.html:
This merge was a little tricky because some camera intrinsics work from pull request #2058 was backported to gazebo9 in pull request #3099 with some changes. Per this prior discussion:

gazebo10 has protected members:

Camera::cameraProjectiveMatrix
Camera::cameraUsingIntrinsics

while gazebo9 has

CameraPrivate::cameraProjectionMatrix (note change from Projective -> Projection)
CameraPrivate::cameraUsingIntrinsics

Following the suggestion from @Ian Chen in that comment thread, I've done the following:

  • changed the code to use the protected members
  • removed the private members added in pull request #3099
  • added the Camera::BuildProjectionMatrix function alongside Camera::BuildProjectiveMatrix
  • changed Camera::BuildProjectiveMatrix to call Camera::BuildProjectionMatrix internally
  • added a doxygen \deprecated tag to Camera::BuildProjectiveMatrix, though we won't officially deprecate it until the default branch

Checking CI and awaiting review of the conflict merging from @Ian Chen.

title: Merge 9 -> 10
